import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { ItemsForm } from "../../../../types/ItemsForm"; interface AddEditFoodItemFormProps { editMode: boolean; handleClose: () => void; onSubmit: (data: ItemsForm) => void; } export const AddEditFoodItemForm: React.FC = ({ editMode, handleClose, onSubmit, }) => { const { register, handleSubmit, setValue, formState: { errors }, reset, } = useForm(); return ( <>
{editMode ? "Edit Item" : "Add New Item"}
{errors.name && ( This field is required )}
{errors.category && ( Category is required )}
{errors.iddsi_level && ( IDDSI Level is required )}
); };
